transcript: true sales doesn't feel like sales it just feels like making an informed decision with somebody who is an expert who helps you make the best decision for you you help the person that you're speaking to decide not that they buy think about it like this you're side by side with them you've got a sword and they don't and they're like the monsters are in here and you're like all right let's open the doors that's the role of the salesman it's like you can kill these demons in front of them you're like it's not your husband's responsibility it's not the fact that you don't have time because I can promise you there's someone who's had it worse has done better and so you can have those real conversations
